Case Studies

  • DRRPP: Disaster Risk Reduction Project Portal. Asia Disaster Preparedness Center
  • RMS: Resource Management System. International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies
  • SHARE: Humanitarian Country Team (HCT) Relief and Rehabilitation System. UN Resident Coordinator's Office, Sri Lanka
  • UCCE: User-Centered Community Engagement. Oxfam, Plan International, Save the Children. Surveys designed on web, entered offline on mobile app.
